name: hey girlie!! xx
description:
cw: some body horror (transforming from human to beast)

this is my favorite bit to do at scammers online. i did pretend to be a ghost one time, picking a very specific haunted theater in kansas, but this is the classic for me: roleplaying transforming into an animal until they inevitably stop responding or block me.

controls: press any button to start. use WASD or arrow keys to move. press any button to progress dialogue.

Music: Adventure by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/legalcode

audio added using candle's bitsy audio tool

itchio cover image made using these three public domain images and ms paint: 1, 2, and 3. background image is hieronymus bosch's hell from the garden of earthly delights tryptich
